links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..900
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (21, -108).
formula: (12^(n+1)-9^(n+1))/3 - Lambert Klasen (lambert.klasen(AT)gmx.net), Feb 05 2005a(n-1)=Sum(3^(n-1)*3^(n-k)*binomial(n, k),k=1..n). - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Sep 24 2006a(0)=1, a(n)=12*a(n-1)+9^n. [From Vincenzo Librandi, Feb 09 2011]a(0)=1, a(1)=21, a(n)=21*a(n-1)-108*a(n-2). [From Vincenzo Librandi, Feb 09 2011]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
